author: Staff Reporter
text:
3 of family succumb

to burns

Three of a family, who sustained burns in a domestic gas cylinder blast on Wednesday morning, succumbed to burns at the Government Vellore Medical College Hospital.

Sankara Narayanan (39) was residing in Sathuvachari along with his wife Usha (27), two children – daughter Keerthika (9) and son Sai Krishnan (4). On Wednesday morning, he lit a cigarette not realising that the house was filled with gas following a leak in the cylinder. This caused a fire, and all four of them sustained burn injuries.

Police said Sankara Narayanan and his son Sai Krishnan succumbed to the injuries on Wednesday night, while Usha succumbed to the burns at 6 p.m. on Thursday. Keerthika is still critical. — Staff Reporter
title: Three of a family succumb to burns
